item.title: Hole, 11 inches deep, in pavement, Foxwell Drive/Hillview Road junction, 4th April
item.description:
Hole, 11 inches deep, on pavement at junction of Foxwell Drive and Hillview Road. From comparison with Google Maps of 2012, the hole looks as though it is where a black bollard used to be. For anyone who is Severely Sight Impaired (Blind) or Sight Impaired (Partially Sighted) and who uses a walking stick, there is the possibility of the person not seeing the hole and their walking stick going down it. I am concerned that if a person's walking stick does goes down the hole, the person will have a nasty accident. Could someone fill the hole or fit a new bollard, please?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Foxwell Drive, Hucclecote, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
The drain with the missing metal cover is located: Outside number 23 Jasmin Way, Up Hatherley, Cheltenham, GL51 3HZ. It is on the road next to the bushes separating the road from the front garden of number 23.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 21, Jasmin Way, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Traffic light sequence out and causing traffic jams, 4th April
item.description:
The traffic lights on the intersection of Hucclecote Road and Churchdown Lane/Carisbrooke Road is still causing major problems despite having originally been reported in February. There are now temporary traffic lights due to the Severn Trent works (disappointing given that the road has only just been resurfaced) but somehow these are only 3 way lights on a 4 way junction. Please could someone finally sort the traffic light sequencing out once the main lights are back up and running as this is causing traffic to back up from Top Shop on the corner of Churchdown Lane all the way down to the Wagon & Horses.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hucclecote Road, Hucclecote, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Green or amber traffic light is not working
